alert.note: Alert for Apache; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 12 at 7:53PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT NEAR SUNRISE SPRINGS, GREASEWOOD, AND CORNFIELDS UNTIL 9 PM MST/10 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall and runoff continues. * WHERE...Areas from Greasewood, Sunrise Springs, Cornfields, and northward on the Navajo Nation, in Apache and Navajo counties. * WHEN...Until 900 PM MST /1000 PM MDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in creeks and normally dry washes is imminent or occurring. Water flowing over roadways will create slick paved roads and muddy unpaved roads. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 747 PM MST /847 PM MDT/, the public reported that Indian Route 15 is closed due to flooding at mile post 95 between Cornfields and Greasewood. This report was from the Navajo Nation Road Conditions Facebook page. Minor flooding will continue as water drains. The heavy rain has ended across the advised area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain had fallen. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Pueblo Colorado Wash, Steamboat Wash and Big Dam Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sunrise Springs, Cornfields Chapter House, Cornfields, Greasewood Springs, Burnside, Greasewood and Navajo Reservation. - This includes the following highways... State Route 264 between mile markers 431 and 445. Highway 191 between mile markers 418 and 421. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding of washes and creeks will occur, some dirt roads will become muddy and impassable. Paved roads and underpasses could become flooded as well. In hilly or mountainous terrain, there are many low water crossings which will become dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
